description: I have experience as a assistant lecturer, providing guidance to students, conducting tutorial sessions, and supporting course material development. This experience has enhanced my understanding of the subject matter and honed my communication and leadership skills.

I have successfully completed a self-paced, course-based skills development and training program at Alibaba Cloud Academy. Throughout the program, I acquired knowledge on applying core Alibaba Cloud services in various domains such as compute, storage, networking, machine learning, development tools, and others. Additionally, I gained proficiency in configuring, monitoring, and providing support for the suite of core Alibaba Cloud services.

Learn about various tools to analyze APIs, find vulnerabilities, and keep APIs secure: including Arjun, Burp Suite, Gobuster and others.

Learned how to configure, monitor, and support the suite of core AWS services.
